title: Nightmare Abbey - passage as a whole

content.prompt: The passage as a whole can best be described as a

choices.label: sardonic depiction of an unhappy marriage
biting critique of the excesses of the wealthy
realistic portrayal of everyday life in the nineteenth century
solemn meditation on the challenges of marriage

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Develop a thesis statement that conveys a defensible claim about an interpretation of literature and that may establish a line of reasoning.
